reviewText:
This movie is absolutely adorable. Macky a 300lb+ man is smitten with a socialite Nia and fails to woo her before he gets the help of a personal trainer Aira whom he starts to have feeling for. The question the becomes does he go with the woman of his dreams or the woman who loved him for who he is.

The story is well peformed, the characters are loveable and the movie is a lot of fun. So glad I got to add this to my personal collection.

Aspect ratio is smaller on American TV's. There are English subtitles and it is region coded 0 for all regions.
